ComicInfo.Title: I Defied Gomdulla--The Living Pharaoh!; When the Space Beasts Attack!!; The Maiden and the… Monster!
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Defied Gomdulla--The Living Pharaoh!: An ancient alien robot disguised as an Egyptian mummy-god is reactivated, and forms a cult until it is foiled by a policeman and his own high priest.
When the Space Beasts Attack!!: An alien armada lands on Earth with weapons that seem to disintegrate anything. Humanity is helpless before the aliens, until a farmer realizes that the aliens never fire at humans and spreads the word. The aliens retreat from the humans' firearms because their guns don't affect humans.
The Maiden and the… Monster!: An aquarium attendant tells the origin of a monstrous sea creature on display.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:44:51. [CVDB46621] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:48:24. [Issue ID 63598]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Artie Simek,Jon D'Agostino,Sam Rosen,Artie Simek,Jon D'Agostino,Sam Rosen
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
